trans-unit.source: Exile The General: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.
trans-unit.target: Exile The General: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.

trans-unit.source: Exile The Savant: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
trans-unit.target: Exile The Savant: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

trans-unit.source: Exile The Tyrant: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Exile The Tyrant: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Exile The Warmonger: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Exile The Warmonger: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Exile The Provider: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: Exile The Provider: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

trans-unit.source: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
trans-unit.target: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

trans-unit.source: Your starting hand size is increased by one. Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
trans-unit.target: Your starting hand size is increased by one. Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
